item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - The Warning Live from Auditorio Nacional CDMX
item.description:
On August 21st 2025, a concert film of The Warning will be shown in theaters in North and South America. The name of the show is "The Warning Live from Auditorio Nacional CDMX". It will be in theaters starting August 21st through August 24th. A live album will also be released on August 22nd, but this doesn't include the film. Nothing has been said about a release on DVD/Blu-ray or YouTube, although they have released films of past concerts on YouTube.

Here are links to the show's page on theater websites:
AMC Theaters
Cinépolis

Here are some links to trailers posted by The Warning:
Announcement Trailer
Pre-order Trailer
Extended Trailer

Can somsone get the movie? Thanks in advance!
item.author: Swiftie123
